title.text: Title Sequence Number Lookup and Call No Enhancement
生成种次号并完善索书号

subtitle.text: Title Sequence Number Lookup and Call No Enhancement
生成种次号并完善索书号

description.text: Look up title sequence number via external API and enhance the call number field based on this cloud App configuration.
通过外部API获取书目种次号，并根据本App的配置生成和完善书目索书号字段及子字段信息。
